item.description:
Hi!

Join us to share what you have manifested and how. If you're just learning to consciously attract what you want in your life, bring questions and an open mind.

We will meet from 1:30pm-3:00pm.

Panera is in a small plaza of shops after Kelly's, next to Marshalls and across the street from Target off the the Lynn Fells Pkwy. It is on the South side of Route 1.

See you there!

Julie
Organizer
617-678-5061 (c)
item.how_to_find_us: I will get us tables and seats in the area where the fireplace is.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Weekend Meetup
